messages.message:
Awesome. Thanks. @jack.robbins and I also raised couple of more bugs with respect to access controls. 

Seems like only an org admin can close human reviews. In that case waiting for two steps to get data moving downstream can delay output and affect SLA significantly. While it is needed sometime. It should be configurable and not mandated. A user should be able to complete HR review and close their assigned reviews to push data downstream if needed

If that’s the case that’s definitely a bug - the manager of the workspace the data is in should be able to close the review, not just an org admin, but also not any user. I’ll check this monday morning.
